title: 25 years of terror at Universal Orlando's Halloween Horror Nights
text: BING NEWS: 25 years of terror at Universal Orlando's Halloween Horror Nights Orlando — Inside a sprawling soundstage at Universal Studios, a young woman with orange-tinted bangs sits at a table. She carefully puts the finishing touches on a "Bride of Chucky" mask, sewing in the wig. Fur balls float across the floor, thanks to ... 09/8/2015 - 2:09 pm | View Link 'Harmless' hoarder jailed for 5 years after being found with arsenal of deadly weapons A hoarder discovered with an arsenal of deadly guns and ammunition has been jailed for five years - despite a judge admitting that he poses "no danger" to the public. Neil Incorvaya's home was raided after he proudly showed off his collection of weapons to ... 08/12/2015 - 11:34 pm | View Link Happy Birthday JAWS! Celebrating 40 years of the original terror from the deep JAWS has been a staple of the Universal Studios Backlot Tour since the 80’s ... and has brought many people together in their sheer terror of that big ole shark that devours helpless people.
